item.title: Forward Cargo A/C Ground Exhaust Shutoff Valves

remarks.para: Two may be inoperative provided one left and one right valve is operative.

placard.para: Install placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel "____ FWD CARGO A/C GRD EXH S/O VLV – INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Verify operation of the forward cargo ground exhaust valves by doing a forward cargo overboard valve system ground test on any CMC CDU.

numlitem.para: Position Overhead Maintenance panel (P461) or Forward Cargo Compartment (P86) CARGO COND AIR FLOW RATE selector OFF.
On CMC main menu choose GROUND TEST. Select chapter 21 AIR CONDITIONING - CARGO OVBD SYSTEM.
Check that IN PROGRESS is displayed on CMC CDU.
Press FAIL key on CMC to observe messages. Ensure that at least one left and one right valve is operative.
